languages.text: "{name}. У тебя ко мне дело великой срочности..." {n}Лицо дознавателя становится усталым, стоит ему обозреть вашу персону, возлежащую в воде.{/n} "...или ты просто позвал{mf||а} меня ради развлечения? Не отвечай, я, кажется, догадался".

"{name}, is this a matter of terrible urgency, or..." {n}An exasperated expression crosses Heinrix's face when he sees you relaxing in the water.{/n} "...or did you simply call me here for your own amusement? On second thought, don't answer. I think I have assessed the situation for myself."
languages.original_text: "{name}. У тебя ко мне дело великой срочности..." {n}Лицо дознавателя становится усталым, стоит ему обозреть вашу персону, возлежащую в воде.{/n} "...или ты просто позвал{mf||а} меня ради развлечения? Не отвечай, я, кажется, догадался".

traits.locale_text: "{name}. Is this a matter of terrible urgency, or..." {n}Heinrix's expression grows haggard the moment he sees your reposed self in the water.{/n} "...or did you simply call me here for your own amusement? Don't answer. I think I have assessed the situation myself."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "{name}. Is this a matter of terrible urgency, or..." {n}Heinrix's expression grows haggard the moment he sees your reposed self in the water.{/n} "...or did you simply call me here for your own amusement? Don't answer. I think I have assessed the situation myself."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

On second thought, don't answer. I think I have assessed the situation for myself."

On second thought, don't answer. I think I have assessed the situation for myself."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "{name}, is this a matter of terrible urgency, or..." {n}An exasperated expression crosses Heinrix's face when he sees you relaxing in the water.{/n} "...or did you simply call me here for your own amusement? On second thought, don't answer. I think I have assessed the situation for myself."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « {name}, s'agit-il d'une affaire d'extrême urgence ou... » {n}Heinrix s'interrompt et prend un air exaspéré lorsqu'il vous voit vous détendre dans votre bain.{/n} « ... ou m'avez-vous simplement fait venir pour votre bon plaisir ? Tout bien réfléchi, inutile de répondre. Je crois avoir parfaitement cerné la situation. »
languages.original_text: "{name}, is this a matter of terrible urgency, or..." {n}An exasperated expression crosses Heinrix's face when he sees you relaxing in the water.{/n} "...or did you simply call me here for your own amusement? On second thought, don't answer. I think I have assessed the situation for myself."

traits.locale_text: « {name}, s'agit-il d'une affaire d'extrême urgence ou... » {n}Heinrix s'interrompt et prend un air exaspéré lorsqu'il vous voit vous détendre dans votre bain.{/n} « ... ou m'avez-vous simplement fait venir pour votre bon plaisir ? Tout bien réfléchi, inutile de répondre. Je crois avoir parfaitement cerné la situation. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «{name}, ¿se trata de algo urgente o...?». {n}Al ver que estás relajad{mf|o|a} en la bañera, la exasperación se hace visible en el rostro de Heinrix.{/n} «... ¿O me ha llamado solo por diversión? Bien pensado, no conteste. Creo que puedo evaluar la situación por mí mismo».
languages.original_text: "{name}, is this a matter of terrible urgency, or..." {n}An exasperated expression crosses Heinrix's face when he sees you relaxing in the water.{/n} "...or did you simply call me here for your own amusement? On second thought, don't answer. I think I have assessed the situation for myself."

traits.locale_text: «{name}, ¿se trata de algo urgente o...?». {n}Al ver que estás relajad{mf|o|a} en la bañera, la exasperación se hace visible en el rostro de Heinrix.{/n} «... ¿O me ha llamado solo por diversión? Bien pensado, no conteste. Creo que puedo evaluar la situación por mí mismo».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “{name}，究竟是发生了非常紧急的事情，还是……”{n}当海因里希看到你在水中闭目养神时，他的脸上满是恼怒之意。{/n}“……还是说，你叫我来，只是为了消遣消遣？算了，这个问题不必回答了，我已经评估过情况了。”
languages.original_text: "{name}, is this a matter of terrible urgency, or..." {n}An exasperated expression crosses Heinrix's face when he sees you relaxing in the water.{/n} "...or did you simply call me here for your own amusement? On second thought, don't answer. I think I have assessed the situation for myself."

traits.locale_text: “{name}，究竟是发生了非常紧急的事情，还是……”{n}当海因里希看到你在水中闭目养神时，他的脸上满是恼怒之意。{/n}“……还是说，你叫我来，只是为了消遣消遣？算了，这个问题不必回答了，我已经评估过情况了。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「{name}、これは緊急の問題ですか、それとも…」{n}水中でくつろぐあなたを見て、ハインリックスは苛立った表情を浮かべた。 {/n}「それとも、面白半分で私を呼んだのですか？いや、答えなくて結構です。自分で状況を判断できます」
languages.original_text: "{name}, is this a matter of terrible urgency, or..." {n}An exasperated expression crosses Heinrix's face when he sees you relaxing in the water.{/n} "...or did you simply call me here for your own amusement? On second thought, don't answer. I think I have assessed the situation for myself."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}、これは緊急の問題ですか、それとも…」{n}水中でくつろぐあなたを見て、ハインリックスは苛立った表情を浮かべた。 {/n}「それとも、面白半分で私を呼んだのですか？いや、答えなくて結構です。自分で状況を判断できます」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "{name}, ist das eine Angelegenheit von großer Dringlichkeit oder"{n}, ein verärgerter Ausdruck huscht über Heinrix' Gesicht, als er sieht, wie du dich im Wasser entspannst,{/n} "oder habt Ihr mich nur zu Eurer Belustigung hergerufen? Wobei, nein, beantwortet das lieber nicht. Ich glaube, ich habe die Lage schon selbst beurteilt."
languages.original_text: "{name}, is this a matter of terrible urgency, or..." {n}An exasperated expression crosses Heinrix's face when he sees you relaxing in the water.{/n} "...or did you simply call me here for your own amusement? On second thought, don't answer. I think I have assessed the situation for myself."

traits.locale_text: "{name}, ist das eine Angelegenheit von großer Dringlichkeit oder"{n}, ein verärgerter Ausdruck huscht über Heinrix' Gesicht, als er sieht, wie du dich im Wasser entspannst,{/n} "oder habt Ihr mich nur zu Eurer Belustigung hergerufen? Wobei, nein, beantwortet das lieber nicht. Ich glaube, ich habe die Lage schon selbst beurteilt."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "{name} çok acil bir durum mu var yoksa..." {n}Seni suda rahatlamış bir durumda gören Heinrix'in yüzünde çileden çıkmış bir ifade oluşuyor.{/n} "Yoksa beni sırf kendini eğlendirmek için mi çağırdın? Tekrar düşündüm de... Yanıt verme. Sanırım durum değerlendirmesini kendim yapmış bulundum."
languages.original_text: "{name}, is this a matter of terrible urgency, or..." {n}An exasperated expression crosses Heinrix's face when he sees you relaxing in the water.{/n} "...or did you simply call me here for your own amusement? On second thought, don't answer. I think I have assessed the situation for myself."
